subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ashton Gibbs had 18 points and No. 4 Pittsburgh used a big second half to beat reeling No. 19 Villanova, 60-50, on Saturday.
snippet: Ashton Gibbs had 18 points and No. 4 Pittsburgh used a big second half to beat reeling No. 19 Villanova, 60-50, on Saturday.
